channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report E-2024120062
item.description:
Report E-2024120062

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-06T12:24:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-11
  • City: RICHMOND
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING TRANSPORTATION PHASE DRIVER DISCOVERED SLIGHT RELEASE FROM CTMV. INVESTIGATION FOUND LOOSE BOLT. BOLT REPLACED, LEAKED STOPPED AND DELIVERY MADE WITHOUT ADDITIONAL INCIDENT.
